about: I'm a Computer Science student at Washington University in St. Louis with a passion for building scalable systems and data-driven products. I specialize in backend development, analytics pipelines, and ML tooling. I enjoy solving complex problems and shipping features that create measurable impact. Currently seeking full-time opportunities in product engineering, backend systems, or ML infrastructure.
